EmailTemplate.name: Certification
EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for notifying work item owners of new certifications.

Argument.name: workItemName
Argument.Description: The description property (also the name property) of the certification WorkItem.

Argument.name: workItem
Argument.Description: The WorkItem object for the certification.

Argument.name: requesterName
Argument.Description: The display name of the Identity that requested the certification.

Argument.name: ownerName
Argument.Description: The display name of the Identity that owns the certification.

EmailTemplate.Body:
A new access certification report has been assigned to you: $workItemName.
Login and view your work item inbox to complete this access certification report.
EmailTemplate.Subject: New access certification: $workItemName
